label: Bigger Font Size
name: com.msgbyte.biggerfont
author: moonrailgun
description: Add the feature of enlarging the font size to TALKS, which is convenient for different user
description.zh-CN: 为TALKS增加放大字号的功能,方便不同用户群体

label: Miaolang
name: com.msgbyte.miaolang
author: msgbyte
description: It is allowed to send mars, and the two parties encrypt the conversation after installing the plugin. People who have not installed the plugin will see '*'
description.zh-CN: 允许发送火星文，安装插件后的双方加密对话，未安装插件的人看到的是 '*'

label: Openapi Platform Plugin
name: com.msgbyte.openapi
author: msgbyte
description: Provide the operating capability of the open platform for the application
description.zh-CN: 为应用提供开放平台的操作能力

label: third party integration
name: com.msgbyte.integration
author: moonrailgun
description: Used to integrate third-party applications in groups
description.zh-CN: 用于在群组中集成第三方应用

label: AI Assistant
name: com.msgbyte.ai-assistant
author: moonrailgun
description.zh-CN: 为 Talks 提供 AI 助手
